content: crochet this modern day regency-inspired drawstring bag using the lovely shell this elegant and romantic bag is quick to work up and can be worn cross body make one for yourself and your little ones so you can match the free **rosette drawstring bag** crochet pattern can be found *** here 1 *** note that the pdf for purchase is 11 pages and includes the full photo tutorial the pattern contains two sizes size 1 and size 2 size 1 requires 1 skein of 24/7 cotton i used camel and size 2 requires 1 5 skeins of 24/7 cotton i used ecru the rosette drawstring bag is the modern version of my popular ** regency reticule 2 ** that i designed for a pride and prejudice ball see the free reticule pattern *** here 3 *** it is such a cute spring and summer bag and the closure allows for easy access to your essential items enjoy crocheting your bags and use the hashtag **#rosettedrawstringbag** on social media 1 https //www allaboutami com/rosette-drawstring-bag/ 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/regency-reticule 3 https //www allaboutami com/crochet-regency-reticule/
